title: "AI and Dermatologists Similarly Judge Melanoma Thickness"
excerpt: "Both readers and artificial intelligence predict melanoma thickness with fair to moderate accuracy using dermoscopy images, according to a study published online July 16 in the Journal of the European Academy of Dermatology and Venereology."
